lines.text:
[opening lines]
Will she come? Do you think she will come?
She will. You know she will.
But when? When?
Very soon. It's just a matter of time. Of waiting for a while. All we have to do is bide our time. Bide our time.
[laughs]
But it's been so long. So many years. When will she come and set us free-set us free!
Patience! Patience! We've all the time in the world.
[laughs]
We've all the time in the world. In the world. In the world. To set us free! In the world!
[Maniacal laughter]

[closing lines]
When will they come? When will they come? When will they come and set us free?
Of course they will come. You know they will.
But when? When? When?
Soon. Very soon. We've lots of time. Lots of time. All the time in the world.
All the time in the world . Time. Time. Time to set us free again.
All the time in the world.
To set us free. Set us free. Set us free in the world. Free. Free. Free in the world. Set us free!
[Maniacal laughter]

[on a shopping spree]
Maybe Alex is right. Maybe I am losing my mind.
You know how a husband can tell you've lost your mind?
[laughs and takes her arm]
When you stop spending their money! So let's go spend some more of our husbands' money right away.
Don't hurt her!
But I want to!
